basic_info.name: Facts and Figures of College of Agricultural Engineering, Guntur
Why to Join College of Agricultural Engineering, Guntur?

Section.name: About CAE
Section.description:
Farming needs to be intensified and made sustainable, which can be accomplished through modern engineering and research, in educational institutions. College of Agricultural Engineering provides bachelor of engineering degree and masters with specialization in soil & water engineering, farm machinery & power, processing & food engineering, and also Ph.D. Development and optimization of agriculture is indispensable for our country as it will support the rural community and provide substantial contribution to our economy.
Established
1983
University
Acharya N.G. Ranga Agricultural University
Admission
Engineering, Agriculture and Medical Common Entrance Test by Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University Hyderabad
Library
8414 books, 12 Indian journals, 6 international journals
Accommodation
Niveditha Girls Hostel, Dr. K.L. Rao Hall of Residence, New Boys Hostel
Scholarship
National Merit Scholarship, State Scholarship for economically backward stipend to P.G. students and other allowances
Others
Health clinic, computer lab
